message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one taking the risk of negotiation!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for my efforts. Your turn!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking a bigger share now!
I'm trying to find a middle ground. Meet me halfway?
You're getting close to the edge, I'm taking the majority now!
I'm trying to hold on to some value. Will you meet me here?
You're running out of options, I'm taking control now!
I'm holding on to a tiny fraction of the remaining value. Is this the best you can do?
You're almost out of time, but I'll give you a tiny crumb.
I'll take the last bit of value. You can have the rest.
You're out of time, I'm taking it all!
